# f5distributedcloud_service_policy (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_service_policy` data source retrieves information about an existing service policy.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_service_policy" "example" {
  name      = "my-service-policy"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "policy_algo" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.algo
}
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example: Service Policy Data Source
# This example retrieves information about an existing Service Policy

data "f5distributedcloud_service_policy" "example" {
  name      = "my-service-policy"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

# Output the service policy details
output "policy_id" {
  description = "ID of the Service Policy"
  value       = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.id
}

output "policy_description" {
  description = "Description of the Service Policy"
  value       = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.description
}

output "policy_algo" {
  description = "Algorithm used by the Service Policy"
  value       = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.algo
}

# Use the data source to reference an existing service policy
# Service policies are commonly used to control traffic flow and access
resource "f5distributedcloud_http_loadbalancer" "protected" {
  name        = "protected-app"
  namespace   = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.namespace
  description = "Load balancer protected by ${data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.name}"

  domains = ["secure.example.com"]

  http {
    port = 80
  }

  default_route_pools {
    pool {
      name      = "backend-pool"
      namespace = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.namespace
    }
    weight = 1
  }

  service_policy {
    name      = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.name
    namespace = data.f5distributedcloud_service_policy.example.namespace
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the service policy to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the service policy is located.

### Read-Only

- `algo` (String) Algorithm used by the service policy (FIRST_MATCH, DENY_OVERRIDES, ALLOW_OVERRIDES).
- `description` (String) Description of the service policy.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the service policy.
